name: Cowardly Heroes
description:
An Alien invasion has arrived and these heroes are doing what they do best: running! Help them dodge and avoid the many incoming obstacles and enemies in this offline arcade game. Start a fun and challenging run. Collect coins to increase your score and unlock new heroes and bonuses, grab random risky powerups, dodge and overcome enemies, and progress to new challenging levels! Deadly lasers, threatening skeletons, angry minotaurs, fragile barrels, and many more creative obstacles are waiting to ruin your high score!

👾AWESOME FEATURES:
★ A fast-paced, free offline running-based arcade game
★ Fun Pixel Art 16-bit nintendo-based game style
★ Easy to play and understand (just swipe or tap)
★ Progressive challenging levels
★ Random powerups that makes you be on your toes
★ Overcome enemies and obstacles
★ Daily rewards and free coins
★ Unlock new heroes and bonuses
★ Achievements, trophies and highscore leaderboards to compete with friends
★ Play without wifi or any internet connection
★ Plays well on high and low resolution devices with very little performance requirements due to its small size
★ An incredibly addictive offline game with tons of surprising moments
★ And much more coming soon with frequent updates!

⚡ For how long can you dodge the lasers? FREE DOWNLOAD NOW!
